title: New item: Shushkan's Arcblade (AD)
body:
Shushkan's Arcblade
75 Attack Damage
200 Health
15 Attack Speed
8 Life Steal
Passive:
Every time you hit your target with basics or abilities and everytime you get a kill or an assist the blade stacks.It stacks your AD and your health.Every stack you get 50 health and 10 AD.Max stacks are 50.Every kill is one stack with max stacks you can get 2500+ health and 500+ AD but getting max stacks is impossible.Every time you die you will have less stacks.
Ability:
When activating it throws a skillshot nuke that explodes in a circle at the end of its path it slows and it does 70 damage
